attributes.action: stop the proposed tax on landlines to fund implementation of broadband.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The government is proposing a monthly tax on every fixed land-line to fund implementation of broadband across the country.
This is an unfair tax on those who already have broadband (and are paying for it - plus the line rental - themselves).
Also, not everyone actually wants broadband - there are many who are quite happy with dial-up.
